version_description:
Improved controls (no more digging while looking around)
Improved performance
Redesigned user friendly interface
Miner helmet
Decorative pipes
Facebook integration
Fixed issue with losing items
Added description for all items
Improved memory usage
Korean translation
Japanese translation
Portuguese translation
Ability to load automatically a world at startup

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

New epic storyline
Ride your pets and 29 other creatures
Achievements
Villages
Volcanoes
Rebalance monsters
Spawners are not visible
Tools durability
Axe, shovel, hammer
Furnace
Thai translation
Paint brush
Spell to trap creatures
Many bug fixes
